title: Figurine of a Bullfrog
description:
One figurine of a bull frog in green stone; it sits on a scribed, circular base and is hollow; the neck is swollen as if croaking. 
Condition: The surface is chipped; the swelling of the throat on both sides is broken.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
